title: Mashable
description: Powered by its own proprietary technology, this tech blog is the go-to source for tech, digital culture, and entertainment content for its influential and dedicated global audience!

title: Nerd Fitness
description: Nerd Fitness started in 2009 as a way to help people live a healthy life in any way they can. It's all about getting started, helping beginners, and taking the first step to a healthier lifestyle.

title: GoNintendo
description: By sheer weight of posts alone, this is a required RSS feed or bookmark for anyone interested in Nintendo gaming, whether Wii or DS.
